name: witivio-documentation
description: User documentation for all Witivio products.

scripts.build:css: sass src/.vuepress/styles/main.scss src/.vuepress/dist/main.css && cat src/.vuepress/dist/main.css src/.vuepress/styles/assets/css/*.css >> src/.vuepress/dist/vendor.concat.css && cleancss -o src/.vuepress/public/vendor.min.css src/.vuepress/dist/vendor.concat.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && vuepress build src
